p: Samples were processed for culture by standard conventional methods using Mueller Hinton agar medium (Oxoid Ltd., Basingstoke, and Hampshire, United Kingdom) as the primary isolation medium while Blood agar plates were used for other analysis and examination. Preliminary bench identification was done by standard phenotypic tests. Following preliminary identification, confirmation of isolates was done at the microbiology laboratory using the VITEK - 2 identification system (BioMerieux, France) according to manufacture criteria.
